content.text: Match ends, West Bromwich Albion 0, Watford 1.
Second Half ends, West Bromwich Albion 0, Watford 1.
Attempt missed. Craig Dawson (West Bromwich Albion) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Stéphane Sessegnon.
Odion Ighalo (Watford) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by James McClean (West Bromwich Albion).
Substitution, Watford. Valon Behrami replaces José Manuel Jurado.
Foul by James McClean (West Bromwich Albion).
Etienne Capoue (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Mario Suárez (Watford) left footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Odion Ighalo.
Attempt blocked. Mario Suárez (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Troy Deeney.
Penalty saved! Saido Berahino (West Bromwich Albion) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Troy Deeney (Watford) is shown the yellow card.
